div.p: OBVIOUSLY THE INTERVIEW WENT A LITTLE LONG BECAUSE WE ENJOYED EACH OTHER'S COMPANY, BUT THE
REST OF IT IS UP ON THE WEBBY WEB.
HERE IT IS, YOUR MOMENT OF ZEN.
>> SO WHAT'S GOING TO HAPPEN NOW TO THE ECONOMY.
THAT'S WHAT FOLKS ARE FOCUSED ON RIGHT NOW.
IT ALL COMES DOWN TO THAT THREE-LETTER WORD CALLED JOBS,
